0.0: After the equipping character hits an opponent with a Plunging Attack, all nearby party members' Plunging Attacks deal <cryo>28%</cryo> increased DMG for 20s. When other nearby party members hit opponents with Plunging Attacks, they will restore <cryo>2.5</cryo> Energy to the equipping character. Energy can be restored this way every 0.7s.
